attributes.action: Sack the MP's who have defrauded the British tax paying Public - Mr Brown you have the power to do this over your own party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition's purposes is to try and sack all the MP's who have been abusing their position and lining their own pockets at our expense. 

While these utter charlatans have been claiming to represent the people they have been defrauding their expenses while, we (the people that elected them) are losing our jobs and struggling to pay mortgages and childcare bills.

I've already had one petition rejected, no suprise there. What a complete shambles this governement is and I've voted labour since 1988. I doubt I'll vote again. Jokers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
